user_agreement_content:
This is a sample user agreement content. Please read all terms and conditions carefully before accepting. By using this application, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. This agreement may be updated from time to time, and your continued use of the application constitutes acceptance of any changes.

Data Collection and Usage:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support. We may also collect information about how you use our service.

Privacy and Security:
We take your privacy seriously and implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent.

User Responsibilities:
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You must not use the service for any unlawful purpose.

Termination:
We may terminate or suspend your account at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

Changes to Agreement:
We reserve the right to modify this agreement at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new agreement on this page.

Contact Information:
If you have any questions about this agreement, please contact us at support@example.com.

By clicking 'I understand', you acknowledge that you have read and understood this agreement and agree to be bound by its terms.
